s: I use Wusthof Classic knives and some brand of steak knives that are not serrated. I have always used Chef's Choice electric sharpeners and have no complaints with them. I gave my daughter my parents TV Bavarian edge black diamond knife sharpener after they passed. I had used it several times when visiting her and cooking for them. I always thought this thing really does work. I decided to search these types of sharpeners on Amazon and decided to go with the Grihot...
